title: Backward prop for LRN
body_html: Looks there there is an implementation for forward pass of LRN layer, however I was not able to find the backward propagation equations. Could someone point them out to me? Or does pytorch not support backward pass for LRN at this point?
body_text: Looks there there is an implementation for forward pass of LRN layer, however I was not able to find the backward propagation equations. Could someone point them out to me? Or does pytorch not support backward pass for LRN at this point?
